edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.transientEpisodicMemory
Class TEMDriver

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.transientEpisodicMemory.TEMDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stoppable, java.lang.Runnable
public class TEMDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Stoppable

This is the driver for the transient episodic memory. The driver takes care of running the thread and allowing access to the local associaiton.

Author:
Rodrigo Silva L.

TEMDriver

public TEMDriver(TransientEpisodicMemory tem,
                 FrameworkTimer timer,

Constructor of the class.

Parameters:
tem - a transient episodic memory for this driver
timer - the timer used to handle the start/pause of the thread
cue - the cue used to write on this memory
